S.FORM: alang Ponaway ga niya mki sku Sincik Keng atu Nahuy go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 32 buwan, 126 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 98 kyan ku 124 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 2 kyan ku 2 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 93 , Amis 1 , Truku 1 , binah lihuyan s'uli 4 . maki qu ngasal bziran, ru kyokay. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Ponaway hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na Ponaway hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na Ponaway hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na Ponaway hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na Ponaway hya' ga Plmwan. tay 'zil na Ponaway hya' ga Llyung. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh
